reviewText:
I couldn't find a modern movie that I loved that I wanted my kids to see, so I chose one that I loved growing up. I found Big and knew they would enjoy it. I was pleasantly surprised that The Toothfairy movie was very good also. I like that both movies have no violence or sex... something I think kids see far too much in modern movies and video games.
It turned out to be a great Christmas gift.
Thanks!
